snippet.title: Castle of Riddles - BBC Micro [Longplay]
snippet.description:
What do you think of Castle of Riddles?
This is a longplay of the BBC Micro version which was released in 1983.
The video will show a full walkthrough and display the gameplay.

Did you play this game or have any opinion on what you can see?
Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

Completion Criteria: Ending

Developed by: Peter Killworth
Published by: Acornsoft
Played by: Gremolin

----
